descriptionProfile: Artist, and Satellite Foundation Ambassador. Enquiries: phil@chiliphilly.com
Artist, and Satellite Foundation Ambassador. Enquiries: phil@chiliphilly.com

posts.description:
GOOD MORNING

Hope everyone is well, I just woke up and have stuff to do but it's rare I'm up so early... So here's a photo! 
Something dunno #fashion HAHAHAHA hope you're all well.

Hey guys!

So I made this rice bowl hat because this year I'm an official ambassador for Oaktree's Live Below The Line Campaign!  I'll be participating by living on $2 a day for 2 days.

Live Below the Line raises funds for education initiatives in the Asia-Pacific region to end poverty and empower youth!  If you wanna join, head to bit.ly/lbl-17 and sign up!

If you wanna donate to me, hit the link in my bio!

Thanks everyone!

#waybackwednesday!

Remember when my mate @valerie_hex and I were taking promo photos for the first ever @feeling.yummy? HA

Well lucky for everyone in Sydney, the cabaret is here at the Red Rattler in Marrickville tomorrow night! It starts at 9, which gives you plenty of time to get there after we finish up Cocktails and Crochet up at @australiandesigncentre!

So hit up @feeling.yummy for their tickets!

See you all tonight/tomorrow!

Did anyone just hear me having a good ol' chat on the radio? Thanks @lewishobba abd @veronicamilsom for having me!! But more importantly thanks to @australiandesigncentre and everyone who came to my exhibition opening last night! I had so much fun seeing and catching up with everyone!

The last few weeks in Sydney have really reenergized me in the sense of making new work, and I can't wait to show everyone what I wanna do!

Anyway my Artist Talk is at ADC at 2pm so come if you wanna ask me questions HAHA

Anyway TGIF, have a good weekend everyone! (Thanks @jesshallay for the pic!) 📷📷📷📷📷

This Isn't A Sad Face (Its An Angry One). So the guys over at @diesel asked me for my interpretation of one of their rules #forsuccessfulliving and I decided to do #41: alter your ego!

I would definitely say @chiliphilly is not the same entity as Phil but I'm learning for both of them to exist in the one body!

Anyway, hope you're all well.

Philly.

#spon

Sometimes your friends go to @commbank and see your giant smiley face looking back!

A few weeks ago I was Australian of the Day, because of my collaborations with The Satellite Foundation.  The best part of what I've been able to do are the experiences and the people I've met but most importantly the people I may have helped in different ways without knowing it!

Anyway thanks @sosavy91 for the photo, it made my week/day/month!

#85: COME TO YUMMY!

So everyone should come to YUMMY! If you like cabaret, dance, circus, drag (and even my work will be in it) all LIVE, then you should totally come! It features performers (alongside some other special guests) such as @karenfromfinance @hanniehelsden @benilola @jandruze @bendy_ben Yana Alana and most importantly James Welsby aka @valerie_hex!

It's on TONIGHT until the 9th! 7:30 - 9:30 every night but two shows on Saturday, one at 6 and the other at 9!

I left the ticket link in my description for everyone to click on!

I hope everyone comes and sits with me! It'll be fun!

I'll see you soon!

#84: NO POINT CRYING OVER SPILT MILK.

TAG A MATE WHOS AN UGLY CRIER!

DAIRY THEME?! So I've been busy over the last few weeks but I should remind you about seeing my work over at @michaelreidsydney which leaves soon! If you can't go in person you can check it out at michaelreid.com!

Also my bio still has the link to come see YUMMY!

Follow me on Snapchat of you feel and I have a new separate Instagram for when I wear these out and about @thediningroomtable. 
Anyway I need to have a long hard sleep.

Hope everyone has had a solid weekend!

#83: 🐐🧀 Hello! I hope everyone is ready for the long weekend!

This is the second hat I made for @yvcheese for their 14 days of cheese tasting at the #SydneyRoyalEasterShow on until the 30th of March!

Not only is there #freetastings and lots of #cheese but you are also still able to purchase their $15 show bag special of a cooler bag and three cheeses!

So if you are heading to #sydneyshow and wanna try on these hats, they can be found in the @woolworths_au #woolworthsfreshfooddome!

Hope people check them out and tag me in the photos!

Have fun.

#82: MOOOOO!🐄 So I got asked to make two hats for @yvcheese for their 14 days of cheese tastings at the #SydneyRoyalEasterShow, at the #sydneyshowground in the @woolworths_au Fresh Food Dome, 17 – 30 of March! 
They are letting everyone have #freetastings of some of their great #cheese (which I’ve been craving since they asked) but also if you want to purchase any, they have a $15 show special of three cheeses and a cooler bag! 
And even better, you can take a photo with them! 
So if you guys are heading to the #sydneyshow, you should totally check out my hats in person! #yarravalleycheese #woolworthsfreshfooddome @sydney_royal_easter_show 
I hope everyone has had a great week!
